name: Essential Worker
description:
Essential Worker

Controls: Z (do action, accept), Arrow Keys (movement)

This is a game about a grocery store employee and their coworkers

Created in April – May 2020 by Andres Siles-Loayza and Grant Chinn
For the Gaming & Justice course at Georgetown University, taught by Amanda Phillips

Built with GB Studio

If you enjoyed our game, consider donating $ to a strike fund like this one: https://www.gofundme.com/f/wholefoodsmay1strikefund
